channel.title: HostMonster
channel.description:
Well I am getting tired of hosting all my site stuff on my laptop, and have been looking at online hosting stuff, now i have heard that hostmonster is good, but I have a question and their billing support is closed right now.
Does any one know if they accept paypal?
Also, does any one know if ther are good? I need php and a database, and I think they have it so thats good. Does any one know of any other online hosts that support php and have mysql? I don't even need much space, they are saying like 300 gigs, when I could suffice with even just 1 very easily.

item.title: HostMonster
item.dc:creator: @error.login cane
item.description:
@error.login wrote:

[quote=“Niall, post:5, topic:173257”][quote author=error.login link=topic=233520.msg1996297#msg1996297 date=1200341980]

I have hostmonster, and yes, they accept paypal. I would reccomend, however if you need a large amount of hdd space(300gb+) beware, it’s shared hosting so if the server your on fills up, you can’t do much until they get more space.

i thought that when somone starts making use of there offer they move you to a seperate server, to help keep there promise. No wait that might be host gator.
[/quote]

I’m not completely sure.[/quote]
yeah i think it is, because i remember reading a post on WHT about it

edit/ you should go to WHT and post a request on there forums for a hosting account, you can allso get a good one at FWHT i got 10gb diskspace, 40gb monthly data transefer and 300 subdomains and allso 5 mysql dbs

Read full topic
